email.label: Email Address
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address format such as yourname@email.com.

wallet.label: Wallet Address
wallet.minlength: The wallet address you entered is incomplete, please check this field and try again.
wallet.invalid: The wallet address you entered is invalid. Please make sure you are using only alphanumeric characters.

errors.spoofing-attempt: Failed to verify signer when comparing {wallet1} to {wallet2}

metamask-install.title: Hello!
metamask-install.p1: To enter BitGuild, you must install MetaMask - a digital wallet for your browser.
metamask-install.p2: This will also act as your login to the BitGuild Portal (no extra passwords!).

metamask-login.title: You are not logged into MetaMask
metamask-login.p1: Please open MetaMask and follow the instructions to log in.

metamask-network.title: Sorry!
metamask-network.p1: This network is not supported by BitGuild portal. For actual experience please switch to main net. For testing purposes please use Rinkeby

register.title: Welcome to BitGuild
register.n1: Make sure you save your MetaMask login information and account recovery details!
register.n2: We can’t help you recover it if you lose access.
register.text:
BitGuild requires all users to sign with their private key in order to safeguard against spoofing attempts.

Our mission is to revolutionize the global gaming industry by creating a platform for a brand new class of games that live on the blockchain. Blockchain games completely redefine the relationship between players and developers by facilitating full and true ownership of in-game assets, cheap & safe item trading, cross-game compatibility of items & currency, and more. BitGuild’s team consists of cryptocurrency and gaming veterans with decades of experience building international large-scale gaming platforms and communities. BitGuild aims to host the best blockchain games and the largest blockchain gamer community online.

sell.title: Stay tuned!
sell.p1: We will let you know as soon as you are able to sell items.

games.title: Ether Online
games.description: BitSociety is an avatar creation game built into the BitGuild portal that let's you find fantastic high-value items, show them off to everyone, or barter them at the BitGuild marketplace.
